metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28117 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: libdiscover/backends/KNSBackend/KNSResource.cpp in KDE Discover before 5.21.3 automatically creates links to potentially dangerous URLs (that are neither https:// nor http://) based on the content of the store.kde.org web site. (5.18.7 is also a fixed version.)

criterions.comment: plasma-discover package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
